Package it.unipr.barbato.Model.Product

Class ProductOfferImpl

java.lang.Object
it.unipr.barbato.Model.Product.ProductOfferImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductOffer, Serializable
public class ProductOfferImpl extends Object implements ProductOffer
The ProductOfferImpl represents an implementation of the ProductOffer interface. This class provides methods to set and retrieve information about a product offer.
Author:
Vincenzo Barbato 345728
